pkgmetadata.longdescription: Time Varying GARCH Modelling // Simulation, estimation and inference for TV(s)-GARCH(p,q,r)-X models, where s indicates the number and shape of the transition functions, p is the ARCH order, q is the GARCH order, r is the asymmetry order, and 'X' indicates that covariates can be included. The TV long-term component, as in the multiplicative TV-GARCH model of Amado and Ter\"asvirta (2013) doi:10.1016/j.jeconom.2013.03.006, introduces non-stationarity in the variance process, where the GARCH-X short-term component describes conditional heteroscedasticity. Maximisation by parts leads to consistent and asymptotically normal estimates.
